response:

blameless - white
cleared of charges - white
didnt do it - white

wrongfully accused - white
guilt free - white
innocent - white
at fault - black
caught in the act - black
committed crime - black
criminal - black

did it - black
perpetrator - black
responsible for crime - black

I hope that helps, babe!
